archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.5.3a: a) using asset discovery software that looks for unique characteristics of specialised devices (e.g. Shodan, signal discovery tools and specialised security event management tools)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
